name: gramercytech-front-end-technical-2023
description: Using the included assets 'from the client' (assets_from_client.zip), please re-create the screens detailed in the mockup - without adjusting the template in `index.html`, the CSS in `styles.css`, or the base level Vue functionality in `login.js`. Make sure to review all of the files to famaliarize yourself with the project!
